mapper.select:
SELECT ow.id,w.name waiter_name,v.name visiter_name,ow.create_time,ow.number,ow.price,ow.total FROM order_waiter ow,visiter v,waiter w WHERE ow.waiter_id = w.`id` AND ow.`visiter_id` = v.`id`
and v.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{visiterName},'%')
and w.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{waiterName},'%')
LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
